review: I recommend Pavana Prakash Mam for patient friendly and explanation of the problem. I got my mom treated by her and she is recovering fast after the surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Choosing Dr.Pavana Prakash was one of the best decision during the start of our parenthood journey. She is compassionate, empathetic and a down to earth person with human touch which is rare to find during these days. She guided us in a right manner without scaring us though I was overweight. Never prescribed unnecessary  scans or tablets. Always she made sure to be there for us. At the end I had a normal delivery. I would any day recommend her for all future parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My 2nd pregnancy went well because of Pavana Prakash mam.She made me feel so comfortable and all time available wen it comes to any issue. To enjoy ur pregnancy plz go with pavana mam. Her smile can make us to forget pain. I still remember wen I was emotionally breaking down mam was making me fine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Pavana Prakash is an exceptional obstetrician whose expertise and compassion make the journey through pregnancy a positive experience. With meticulous care and clear communication, Dr. Pavana Prakash ensures the health and well-being of both mother and baby. Their dedication to personalized care and support fosters confidence and reassurance for expectant mothers. I highly recommend Dr. Pavana Prakash for their professionalism, expertise, and genuine commitment to maternal and fetal health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was such a pleasant experience with Pavana doctor. Very friendly person and now my wife feels like the doctor belongs to our family.

We never asked the doctor that we want normal delivery and even the doctor doesn't give false promises that she would do only normal delivery. We just had that mutual trust between us and we believed the doctor 100%.

Before the due date she explained us the scenarios where she could try for c section delivery. Even during that time we didn't ask for assurance of normal delivery. When the time came, everything happened as planned by doctor and my wife had a normal delivery. By this everyone can understand that this doctor is 100% trust worthy.

Even during midnight doctor was answering the calls of sisters to know the status of my wife's condition. She arrived early in the morning once the water broke and delivered the kid. It was such a pleasant experience.

She even took time to check on the patient after delivery and even spoke to the elders of the family to make sure she gets nutritious food and not to restrict to any diet that involves not giving much water etc. and after following the diet that doctor recommended, baby's weight is also increased healthily

She is 100% genuine and we love her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited Dr. Pavana for my first pregnancy at Ovum hospital after being referred by one of my family member.
She has been nothing but patient and helpful. She listens to everything I have to tell her before helping me with solutions. She has been very accurate with her decisions during my pregnancy and monitors closely especially because I was pre-diabetic. She also explains her decisions supported by reasoning. I’m very glad that I decided to continue with her consultation throughout pregnancy till successful delivery of my baby. Post delivery care has also been wonderful helping me for an easy transition. Thank you doctor!! 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I will recommend Dr.Pavana prakash to all pregnant womens. *** ** **** ***** **** ******** ****** *** always welcomes her patients with beautiful smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I first heard about Dr. Pavana Prakash from a friend, and I have to admit, I was a bit hesitant about consulting a gynecologist for the first time, especially since it was related to my pregnancy. However, my worries were quickly put to rest after my initial appointment with her. From that point on, I regularly sought her guidance throughout my pregnancy journey.Dr. Pavana Prakash is not only a skilled and knowledgeable doctor, but she also possesses a warm and approachable demeanor. I felt comfortable discussing even the most trivial gynecological concerns with her without any hesitation. Her friendly nature made a significant difference in my experience.Thanks to her expertise and support, my pregnancy journey was largely smooth. Dr. Pavana Prakash played a crucial role in ensuring everything went well. Additionally, her availability on WhatsApp and for calls 24/7 was immensely helpful and convenient. I had a fantastic experience with her during my first pregnancy.Without a doubt, I highly recommend Dr. Pavana Prakash to anyone in search of a competent and affable doctor. She genuinely cares for her patients and provides exceptional care.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My consulting doctor is different and I had visited ovum for delivery . I met pavana mam and explained her about my case . My first delivery was quite complicated and I was afraid during this pregnancy.Pavana mam was very friendly. Unfortunately I had an emergency and my consulting doctor had recommended  to get admitted as the aminiotic fluid was less around the baby.
I explained pavana mam about  this and she immediately  took control of situation.  I had to undergo c section as I stopped feeling baby movements . I was quite well but after a week I had secondary PPH and that was the toughest situation . I was bleeding heavily . Got admitted again and mam picked up the call at 12 in the night and she came to meet me at 2 Am in the night in the hospital. She was available at that odd hours. She stopped my bleeding the same night. She was with me till 7 30 in the morning. D and C was done and I recovered .I would reco her for 3 reasons - friendly , availability, handles high risk during pregnancy 
 very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** **** ************* ** ***** She helped me get through my high-risk, difficult pregnancy with ease. I changed multiple doctors before I settled with her. She makes you feel comfortable, explains every doubt of yours with at most patience and gives you the right advice to help you with your anxiety(because pregnancy is one of the most anxious times in a woman’s life, let’s be honest). My pregnancy was especially a difficult one because , I had a huge intramural fibroid. The doctor I was consulting before her, told me point blank that I might only be able to carry the baby till 34 weeks max and to be prepared for any casualties. She was rude and behaved like I was wasting her time which made me feel anxious and hope less. That’s when I did my research and decided to consult Pavanna Prakash and thank God I did. She put me at ease from our very first meeting, made me feel hopeful, took quick decisions when she saw any issues with my ultrasound and with her help, I was able to deliver my baby at 38th week. I’m ever so thankful to her. Thank you!
I recommend Pavana Prakash Mam for patient friendly and explanation of the problem. I got my mom treated by her and she is recovering fast after the surgery.

Never prescribed unnecessary  scans or tablets. Always she made sure to be there for us. At the end I had a normal delivery. I would any day recommend her for all future parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I consulted Dr. Pavan Prakash for my first pregnancy. All that a woman needs during her pregnancy is proper guidance from someone like mother or a friend. Pavan Ma’am is nothing less than that 😊 she has all the patience in the world- you may ask her a 100 questions, she would patiently answer and ask if we had any more clarifications. My first pregnancy was smooth due to her handholding at every stage. And it’s not over, her decision to make a normal delivery for me was unbelievable. Like every woman who is worried about- doctors recommending c section even if we are capable of having a normal delivery; this thought was on top of my mind. But trust me, even when my family and me asked for c section or asked to epidural procedure due to delivery pains, doctor denied and insisted for a normal delivery and she successfully made it even when there were 3 loops of chord around my son’s neck.. Hats off to you and your team Ma’am 😍 you will always be remembered for your work!! Wish you all the success in your life. May many many more people benefit from your service. Thank God for making this happen through you. 
Thanks a ton Ma’am 😍 lots of luv!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited in the last month of pregnancy for delivery... 

Dr. Pavan Prakash was my angel in disguise.
My chances of having a normal delivery was next to impossible. Bcoz I had fibroids...
But she gave me hopes and kept me positive.
She answered my every query without any hesitation and was always available when needed...
On the day of my labor, I felt like giving up on normal delivery and thought of going for c section. But she didn't let tat happen. 
She along with Dr. Smitha, motivated me to stay strong and give a try before deciding on c section...
N there it was, almost a Medical Miracle. NORMAL delivery with Fibroids and without Epidural... Really unbelievable..
But it wouldn't be possible without Dr. Pavan Prakash. Hats off to her patience and positivity. No words to express my gratitude...
My heart felt thanks to her.
And I strongly recommend her...


The hospital is every well maintained. The Staff are very friendly. 
Visiting doctors would come n check every hour. Sisters always attended with a smile on their face.. 

Overall, I had a great experience... 

Thank you Dr. PAVAN PRAKASH and Sagar Chandramma Hospitals...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Am so happy to share my experience with doctor Pavana Prakash @ovum hospital BSK,am diabetes my whole pregnancy journey went so smoothly under the guide of pavana doc ,i delivery a healthy baby at 37weeks, her analysing skills are top noch,she remember each nd every patient of her,even if she is busy ,any time u call her she will attend nd clears the doubts which is so satisfying ,i use to panic alot but doc always  with a smile nd patience use to clear all my doubts..I recommend doctor Pavana Prakash for a healthy pregnancy...love u nd Thank you so much doc i will miss u.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The best decision we made was to consult Dr. Pavana Prakash. Her expertise, attention to detail, patience and friendliness are unmatchable. 

We wanted to have a  normal delivery. Madam supported us throughout the pregnancy journey, guided us in every aspect,  took utmost care of us and gave us enough confidence. 

On the day of delivery, when everyone around gave up on the hopes of normal delivery and wanted to go for C-Section, madam took the single minded decision and made sure to make it a normal delivery, which was way past midnight. Post delivery, she had utmost patience to deal with the situation and left all of us in a very comfortable state. 

My sincere thanks to her for all her efforts and concern towards us. *** **** ****** ** *** ************* I would recommend her to anyone wanting a smooth pregnancy journey and normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Pavana Prakash delivered both my kids. 1st one i had BP. she handled it with lot of effect and patience. She waited for me for the whole day till i deliver a baby. after the delivery all the sisters and aaya told me that other than her nobody could have done it normal delivery. you are lucky...She supported me immensely on that day.And my 2nd baby also normal delivery because of her. fluid was less and heart beat was less at time of delivery.situation was not at all normal and clam. all the doctors around were planning for c section. she was the only one who assured me that its going to be normal delivery, and she did it. am grateful and thankful for her at that particular moment, thanks a lot for her patience and concern.she clears all the doubts without getting irritated, with the same smile till today.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor pavana prakash is very friendly, polite and had solutions to all my problems. She had patience to listen to what patients are undergoing and advice them positively . She never urged anyone's discussion because there are many appointments for the day . She even cancelled her vacations for my delivery. She waited for the labour pains to increase and let me to push baby due to natural contractions only without any alternatives. It was the best experience ever . Even today when I see her a smile comes on my face remembering my pregnancy journey. Thankyou for your dedication towards work.  .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
I visited ovum banashankari hospital for my pre conception and early pregnancy checks that is where I met Pavana mam.

Throughout this she was really friendly, positive and answering all my questions with patience. She always explains the issue very clearly instead of using medical terms so it is clear to the patient.

In pregnancy you have lot of anxiety and stress about many things, I always feel very comfortable Nd confident when I talk to her.

I like the way she treats and highly recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: We are blessed with the baby boy, both the babies delivered under the guidance of Dr Pavana Prakash ma'am. She is an amazing Doctor, has a lot of patience and listens to us all the concerns and responds, also doesn't recommend unnecessary tablets. She will response to the call at any time.She provides simple solutions to all the problems and is highly experienced in her profession.She is also very much service oriented, follows traditional methods.Very humble and calm when she talks to her patients and is very clear in her communication on what is expected from us.Definitely her patient's will going to miss her after delivery. Such a great doctor.I wish I could rate here more than 5 stars.Very fortunate that we could find her.Thanks Dr. Pavana Prakash ma'am.doctor.I wish I could rate here more than 5 stars.Very fortunate that we could find her.Thanks Dr. Pavana Prakash ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very thankful to this hospital (Ovum Hospital) and special thanks to Dr Pavana Prakash madam, under whose guidance I have got treatment throughout the pregnancy and delivery process also. I really appreciate all the nursing staff for their support. She is very simple, soft spoken, friendly & gentle in her behaviour, which made us feel freely interact with the doctor at every visit. She always gives opportunities to say your problems without any hesitation. We observe that she prefers surgery when it is very much required only.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ****** she was an angel for me who was so supportive throughout my pregnancy journey I never thought I will have a normal delivery but doctor made it possible, Even After having 15 plus hour of labour pain doctor with lots of patience waited and made sure that I will have a virginal birth that’s the best part of Pavana Maam Anyone who is looking to have a healthy pregnancy and a normal delivery you can close your eyes and choose Dr pavana ma’am you will never be disappointed

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr pavana Prakash mam she is a second mother and God to me and my family i lost my baby after delivery 2 times in the government hospital . But for my 3 pregnancy mam took very much care like her daughter, even during delivery time also was very comfortable with mam she was like a back bone to me she support me so nicely i didn't felt like I am in OT,really i felt like I am in the hands of my God and my mother and by baby was also healthy really we remember mam each and every second of my baby's development mam thank you so much dear mam, me and my family are very thank full to you mam.🙏🥰❤️

**** **** * *** ****** **** ****** ****** very friendly, she explains everything in detail and clarifies all the queries. And she gives comfort zone to ask our queries. In my case she tried till last to make it normal delivery but due to breech I ended  up with c section..she treated me as her younger sister and took all the care and precaution. On delivery  day without any second thought she was on time for C section as we requested  her and it was early morning. 

Mam used to attend my calls even midnight 3 am and giving suggestion  to me.

Over all I had and having great experience  with pavana ma'am on my delivery  and to be honesty I have referred my sister in law personally to take guidance  under Pavana ma'am for her delivery  and already she is happy the way pavana ma'am treating her. 

Finally Thank u so much ma'am:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulting Dr. Pavana prakash was the best decision I made.she was very patient with all my queries. She also listened to my wish of trying to go all natural with my birthing experience, she made all timely decisions as to have a pleasant and successful normal delivery.she also provides the comfort to ask any number of questions. And finally she provides that mental support during your labour like a family member which one needs during that time.. If one needs a doctor who encourages the patient for normal delivery then she is the one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am consulting Dr Pavan Prakash from last 10 years from planning my first child , pregnancy , Vaginal delivery , coperty insertion and removal, second child pregnancy with  lil complicated C section delivery . She had mentally prepared me from very initial stage for normal delivery during  both my pregnancy. She is very well experienced and takes accurate timely decision. Blessed to have her as my doctor and she is almost like a family member for us now.  One can always be relived of being in safe hands with Dr Pavan Prakash.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
I am happy and fortunate to have chosen Dr Pavana Prakash to deliver my second child. Dr Pavana  is  very friendly and has been a calming effect on me since we had a delivery planned during my later age and had lost all hopes of having my second child. Her guidance and moral support was very helpful during my pregnancy and later during delivery.  My pregnancy was critical since we were in the middle of peak Covid pandemic and Dr Pavana was very helpful in putting down my fears.  
The OT staff and post delivery nursing care at Ovum is very good and the hospital maintained hygiene and cleanliness during the Covid period.
I will definitely suggest Dr Pavana and Ovum hospital for expecting mothers.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
I visited Dr. Pavana during my pregnancy and for my delivery. My consultations through the pregnancy was excellent. Dr. Pavana is very friendly and calm. She would explain every stage in detail and make us feel comfortable.
Dr. Pavana insists on normal vaginal delivery and makes us go through it with ease. The experience overall was excellent. If anyone is looking for a Doctor who gives prominence for normal delivery more, then Dr. Pavana is a go to Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr Pavana Prakash mam for my first pregnancy, *** ** **** ************ she explains each and everything in details and very friendly towards her patients, how much ever questions we ask her she would patiently answer to all our queries and also she will response to the call at any time. 
My first pregnancy was smooth due to her handholding, during delivery due to heavy pain I requested her for a C section , but she denied and her decision for making normal delivery was unbelievable, and I have been blessed with baby girl.
I really appreciate and thank to all nursing staff , my Dietitian and Physician for their support.
Thank you Ovum for taking care so well and Special thanks to Dr. Pavan Prakash mam , I would recommend her to anyone who wanting a smooth pregnancy and normal delivery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: First of all I am very much lucky to meet Dr.Pavana Prakash. I visited her in my 3rd month of pregnancy. In first meeting itself I could feel the positive vibration. She is a person who cares for the patients. When i talk to her I don't feel that she is a doctor, I feel she is one of my family member. Because my experience with her is as such. Throughout my pregnancy she gave lots of courage , care and concern which I'll never forget. I can say that she is the best gynecologist having full of patience to listen our doubts and clear them. Thank u so much mam for being with me throughout my pregnancy time. Once again thanks a lot

review: hi everyone , Pavana Prakash madam was very friendly and she was with us in each n every moment when ever we contacted  on call she was available at all time n her way of treating us was not at all like patients n doctors  it was like our dear ones talking to us n guiding us as we went here for my 3rd pregnancy  we were very satisfied  by her thank u mam for everything

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Pavana Prakash is very humble & friendly doctor, Had deliveries of 2 babies We had the best experience with the doctor she is very supportive and very friendly, She handles high risk pregnancy she has provided the support in handling preterm birth.Highly recommended to anyone who needs the best and family kind of care.

We are satisfied for the support she offered during the period of pregnancy and delivery of our children.
Dr. Pavana provides a space for us to explain our issue. She then explains the causes and solutions in a way we can comprehend it. Very calming presence and assuring. Would highly recommend.
My overall experience was good .I felt she is good,friendly and knowledgeable. She prescribed good medication.

review: Hi in my pregnancy i had complications i had come across many doctors were i didn't find a best result and not satisfied with their opinions atlast wen i came to know about dr. pavana prakash mam i meet her and she gave me boldness to continue my pregnancy journey happily and she was very patience and cleared my doubt thank you mam for ur patience Atlast my pregnancy journey came to an end with a cute girl baby i felt more secured with pavana mam she is friendly so good thank you once again mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Pavana prakash doctor is friendly and kind approachable. She attends call and msg to any doubts and emergencies. Through her guidance I have a healthy baby now. She understands how our body responds to normal delivery or C section.  I strongly recommend pavana doctor for any fertility issue or any treatment of pregnancy .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Recently I gave birth to a baby girl. During my first pregnancy I consulted Dr. pavana prakash mam she is very humble. And she has taken utmost care n delivered the baby, very difficult to find  such a ethical doctor. She is most experienced gynaecologist. Iam very much happy with her treatment. I will rate her 100 out of 100. Thank u mam for being there whenever I needed guidance n care.. I will definitely recommend dr.pavana mam.
